attribute.name: monitorResize
attribute.description: Boolean value that configures whether or not to create a hidden off-screen element that can be used to monitor for text size changes in the DOM

attribute.name: fixedCenter
attribute.description: Boolean value that specifies whether the component should be automatically centered in the viewport on window scroll and resize

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Width of the element in pixels

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: Height of the element in pixels

attribute.name: iframe
attribute.description: Boolean value to place an iframe to prevent other elements with a higher z-index from poking through. (true by default for IE 6 and below)
